context.title: CogniCrypt
context.description: Are you doing Client-side implementation or Server-side implementation? NOTE: If you are implementing on the Server-side, then you must know the IP and port of the server.

context.title: CogniCrypt
context.description: If you know both the IP and port of the server, select Yes.

context.title: CogniCrypt
context.description: Enter both IP and port of the Server. Please ensure that you have entered them correctly.

context.title: CogniCrypt
context.description: Multi-Party Computation scenario to be implemented? Read the description of Euclidean distance and Millionaire's Comparison in the 'Note' section.

context.title: CogniCrypt
context.description: There are five levels of security, from low to high. Choose one!
